actions.name: create_user
statements: INSERT INTO users( id , username , age , wallet ) VALUES ( $id , $username , $age , @caller )

actions.name: update_username
statements: UPDATE users SET username = $username WHERE wallet = @caller

actions.name: create_post
statements: INSERT INTO posts( id , user_id , title , content ) VALUES ( $id , ( SELECT id FROM users WHERE wallet = @caller ) , $title , $content )

actions.name: delete_post
statements: DELETE FROM posts WHERE id = $id AND user_id =( SELECT id FROM users WHERE wallet = @caller )

actions.name: get_user_posts
statements: SELECT title , content FROM posts WHERE user_id =( SELECT id FROM users WHERE username = $username )
